1: שַׁאֲל֨וּ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>Ask</n> מֵיְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>ye of the LORD</n> מָטָר֙ <sup>4306 </sup> <n>rain</n> בְּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in the time</n> מַלְק֔וֹשׁ <sup>4456 </sup> <n>of the latter rain</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[so] the LORD</n> עֹשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall make</n> חֲזִיזִ֑ים <sup>2385 </sup> <n>bright clouds</n> וּמְטַר־ <sup>4306 </sup> <n>of rain</n> גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <sup>1653 </sup> <n>them showers</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and give</n> לָהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לְאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to every one</n> עֵ֥שֶׂב <sup>6212 </sup> <n>grass</n> בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n>

6: וְגִבַּרְתִּ֣י ׀ <sup>1396 </sup> <n>And I will strengthen</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֤ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> אוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and I will save</n> וְהֽוֹשְׁבוֹתִים֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will bring</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> רִֽחַמְתִּ֔ים <sup>7355 </sup> <n>them for I have mercy</n> וְהָי֖וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be as</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>upon them and they shall be as though</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had not</n> זְנַחְתִּ֑ים <sup>2186 </sup> <n>I had not cast them off</n> כִּ֗י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֲנִ֛י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> וְאֶעֱנֵֽם׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and will hear</n>
